alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 11:55AM AKST until February 03 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and periods of light freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Ice accumulations less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Juneau, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. Light freezing rain will cover exposed surfaces with a coating of ice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Multiple rounds of wintry precipitation expected over the next few days. As of 8 AM AKST Wednesday, around 5 to 9 inches of snow has been reported in Juneau and along the Icy Strait Corridor. As of 11 AM AKST Wednesday, freezing drizzle was reported around Juneau and Gustavus. Freezing drizzle could also occur in other adjacent areas like Hoonah and Tenakee Springs. Expect light snow and freezing drizzle through Wednesday night with light snow and ice accumulations through Wednesday night. A second round of heavy snow and/or freezing rain is expected Thursday morning before a transition to rain late Thursday afternoon. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the transition to rain and the freezing rain potential Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
